ratings.comment: Callie is a wonderful professor!! She definitely cares about her students and their ability to grasp and understand the material. Always willing to re-explain or go things more slowly. Her class is wonderful and an easy way to get bio science credit.

Knows her stuff, makes the class easy and understandable, and cares about her students. Attend the lectures, there are a lot of concepts to learn and grasp. The quizzes and exams should be easy if you study and retain information well.

Calli is by far one of the best professors I've ever had. She is incredibly passionate about the material she instructs on and educates phenomenally. Plenty of opportunities exist to make up lost points on exams, quizzes, and lectures. The class content can be a bit difficult to understand at first for non-majors, but Calli still teaches it well.

Calli is an incredible prof -- she knows her stuff and she genuinely cares about her students. Wonderful lecturer with clear explanations and expectations, makes exams and lab quizzes very easy. Highly recommend as an instructor!!
